channel.title: Shoutout on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Shoutout on Adam Israel

item.title: 2010 Nebula Nominations
item.description:
The Nebula Nominations are out! I’m pleased to see several friends and acquaintances on the list. Congratulations to all nominees, but especially toÂ Kij Johnson, Vylar Kaftan, Shweta Narayan, Eric James Stone, J. Kathleen Cheney, M.K. Hobson, Mary Robinette Kowal, and [Nnedi Okorafor][9].

I also let out a little squee to see that my favorite episode of Doctor Who, “Vincent and the Doctor”, is up for the Ray Bradbury Award for Outstanding Dramatic Presentation.

[9]: http://nnedi.com/
